def_en: A shallow container, hole, or area of water measures only a short distance from the top to the bottom.

def_cn: (指人、作品、思想)肤浅的，浅薄的
def_en: If you describe a person, piece of work, or idea as shallow, you disapprove of them because they do not show or involve any serious or careful thought.
If your breathing is shallow, you take only a very small amount of air into your lungs at each breath.
